Write an email
walk to home office and switch on laptop and with the useof mouse and keyboard send mail


[WALK] <home_office> (1.319)
[WALK] <laptop> (1.1000)
[FIND] <laptop> (1.1000)
[SWITCHON] <laptop> (1.1000)
[FIND] <mouse> (1.413)
[GRAB] <mouse> (1.413)
[FIND] <keyboard> (1.415)
[TYPE] <keyboard> (1.415)
